items.title: Soap Trays

itemcodes.description: For flip down drawer front without soap tray - 1 pair of hinges

itemcodes.title: Single Soap Tray - with hinges
itemcodes.description: For single soap tray with 1 pair of hinges

itemcodes.title: Single Soap Tray - no hinges
itemcodes.description: For single soap tray no hinges

itemcodes.title: Double Soap Tray - with hinges

itemcodes.title: Double Soap Tray - no hinges

standards:
The plastic soap tray is available in 2 sizes:
14" wide x 3 3/4" high x 2" deep
11" wide x 3 3/4" high x 2" deep
The minimum cabinet width must be at least 2‚Äù wider than the soap tray width.
The soap tray can attached to the back of a door or the back of a blank drawer with flip-down hinges.
The minimum unit width for double false flip-down drawers with 11" soap trays is 27".
The minimum unit width for double false flip-down drawers with 14" soap trays is 33".
The minimum unit width for single false flip-down drawers with 11" soap tray is 14".
The minimum unit width for single false flip-down drawers with 14" soap tray is 17".
Units that are to 26" wide will not include a header or support. (use single soap tray code)
Unit 27" wide and up will receive a header and support. (use double soap tray code)
